Texts.Chs: 把^orange;外星化合物^reset;带给^red;凯文，你的大君主^reset;。
我不可能在没有^orange;5份外星化合物^reset;的情况下毒死那些^cyan;火箭推动的豚鼠^reset;，也许你能帮我取得一些？我（理论上）会好好地奖赏你的！
Texts.Eng: I cannot possibly poison-tip the ^cyan;rocket-powered guinea pigs^reset; without a supply of 5 ^orange;Alien Compound^reset;. Perhaps you could get me some? I would (in theory) handsomely reward you!

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你，戴夫。现在我终于可以制造一个从未有人见过的武器了另外，它们也^green;非常美味！^reset;，
Texts.Eng: Thanks, Dave. Now I can construct a weapon the likes of which nobody has ever seen. Bonus: They're also ^green;delicious^reset;!
